A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi breaks continuity and open up more plot holes to the franchise... The movie felt like a waste of time. Pacing was bad\, there was no payoffs to the setups in The Force Awaken.\nHypothetically\, the movies would make more sense if we cut the last 5 minutes of The Force Awaken\, and attach it to the last 15 minutes of The Last Jedi..
